title: A Vow to the Future
goal: Establish the new mission, Eldrin fully accepts his role as the Awakened Sage, and the group commits to confronting the ultimate source of the Shadow Blight.
stakes_shift: The group commits to a new, more dangerous journey to confront the ultimate source of the Shadow Blight, accepting their roles as the world's last hope.

bridge.from_prev: The group understands the true, vast scale of the Shadow Blight.
bridge.to_next: The journey to confront the ultimate source of the Shadow Blight begins.

sections.title: The Path Ahead
sections.intent: The group discusses their next steps and the daunting nature of their new quest.

scenes.summary: The allies gather, discussing ancient maps and fragmented lore, seeking clues to the ultimate source of the Shadow Blight.
scenes.outcome: The group begins to plan their journey to confront the true source of the Shadow Blight.

sections.title: The Awakened's Oath
sections.intent: Eldrin fully embraces his role and destiny as the Awakened Sage.

scenes.summary: Eldrin, no longer burdened by doubt, fully embraces his destiny as the Awakened Sage, vowing to cleanse the world of the Shadow Blight.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin fully accepts his role as the Awakened Sage, committing to his destiny.

sections.title: Journey to the Unknown
sections.intent: The group sets out on their new, epic quest, leaving the city behind.

scenes.summary: With a shared purpose, Eldrin and his allies depart the recovering city, their gaze fixed on the distant, unknown lands where the true darkness lies.
scenes.outcome: The group embarks on a new, epic journey to confront the ultimate source of the Shadow Blight.
